SELECT d.defect_id, d.project_num, d.defect_type, d.defect_name, d.defect_describe, d.annex_urls, d.img_urls, d.project_id, p.project_name, d.test_plan_id, d.case_id, d.data_sources, d.data_sources_params, d.module_id, m.module_name, d.module_version, d.create_by, d.create_by_id, d.update_time, d.create_time, d.update_by, d.update_by_id, d.defect_state, d.case_step_id, d.handle_by, un.user_infos AS handle_by_list, d.handle_time, d.defect_level, log.defect_log_id, log.defect_log_type, log.defect_log_describe, log.create_time AS defect_log_create_time FROM sys_defect d LEFT JOIN (SELECT l.defect_log_id, l.defect_log_type, l.defect_log_describe, l.create_time, l.defect_id FROM sys_defect_log l INNER JOIN ( SELECT defect_id, max( create_time ) AS create_time FROM sys_defect_log GROUP BY defect_id ) l2 ON l.defect_id = l2.defect_id AND l.create_time = l2.create_time) log ON log.defect_id = d.defect_id LEFT JOIN sys_module m ON m.module_id = d.module_id LEFT JOIN sys_project p ON d.project_id = p.project_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT d1.defect_id, GROUP_CONCAT(u.user_name) AS user_names, CONCAT('[', GROUP_CONCAT( CONCAT('{"memberId":', CASE WHEN u.user_id IS NOT NULL THEN user_id ELSE 0 END, ',"memberAccount":', CASE WHEN u.user_name IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT('"',u.user_name,'"') ELSE 'null' END, ',"memberName":', CASE WHEN u.nick_name IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT('"',u.nick_name,'"') ELSE 'null' END, ',"phoneNumber":', CASE WHEN u.phonenumber IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT('"',u.phonenumber,'"') ELSE 'null' END, ',"email":', CASE WHEN u.email IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT('"',u.email,'"') ELSE 'null' END, ',"avatar":', CASE WHEN u.avatar IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT('"',u.avatar,'"') ELSE 'null' END,
'}')), ']') AS user_infos FROM sys_defect d1 LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON d1.handle_by REGEXP CONCAT('\b',u.user_id,'\b') OR d1.handle_by REGEXP CONCAT('\\b',u.user_id,'\\b') GROUP BY d1.defect_id ) un ON un.defect_id = d.defect_id
mapper.select: select IFNULL(MAX(project_num),0) from sys_defect where project_id=#{projectId}
